faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Got questions? We've got answers to help you get started.

questions.question: How do I report a civic issue?
questions.answer: Simply click on 'Get Started' or 'Lodge Complaint', create an account, and fill out the complaint form with details, photos, and location. It takes less than 5 minutes!

questions.question: Is it really free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! FixItFast is completely free for citizens. Our mission is to make civic reporting accessible to everyone in the community.

questions.question: How long does it take for issues to get resolved?
questions.answer: Resolution times vary depending on the type of issue and local authorities. Most issues are acknowledged within 48 hours, and you'll receive real-time updates on progress.

questions.question: Can I report issues anonymously?
questions.answer: Yes, you have the option to submit complaints anonymously. However, providing contact information helps authorities reach out for additional details if needed.

questions.question: What types of issues can I report?
questions.answer: You can report various civic issues including street lighting, water supply problems, road damage, sanitation issues, noise pollution, and more. If it affects your community, you can report it!

questions.question: How do I track my complaint status?
questions.answer: After logging in, visit the 'Track Status' page to see real-time updates on all your submitted complaints. You'll also receive notifications when status changes occur.

questions.question: Can I support other community complaints?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Visit the 'Community Feed' to see issues reported by your neighbors and show support for important problems affecting your area.

questions.question: Who handles the reported complaints?
questions.answer: Complaints are forwarded to the relevant local authorities and government departments based on the type and location of the issue reported.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about FixItFast
faqPage.cantFindAnswer: Can't find the answer you're looking for? We're here to help!

questions.question: How do I register for FixItFast?
questions.answer: Simply click the 'Register' button and fill out the form with your name, email, phone, and location. You'll be ready to start reporting issues immediately!

questions.question: Is FixItFast free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! FixItFast is completely free for all citizens. Our mission is to make civic engagement accessible to everyone.

questions.question: How do I report a civic issue?
questions.answer: After logging in, click 'Lodge Complaint', select the issue category, add location details, describe the problem, and optionally attach a photo.

questions.question: How long does it take to resolve complaints?
questions.answer: Resolution time varies by issue type. Street lights typically take 2-3 days, while larger infrastructure issues may take longer. You can track progress in real-time.

questions.question: Can I track my complaint status?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Go to 'Track Status' to see all your complaints and their current progress: Pending, In Progress, or Resolved.

questions.question: What is the Community Feed?
questions.answer: The Community Feed shows issues reported by others in your neighborhood. You can like complaints to show support and help prioritize community concerns.
